attributes.action:
Make Childrens Services in Family Court produce their Evidence of 
Child Abuse
attributes.additional_details:
Children's Services should be charged with perjury
and perverting the course of justice when they knowingly write reports that contain false accusations conjecture etc 
judges should abide with the law and demand to see the evidence of these accusations parents grandparents and anyone accused of child abuse should be at the family law hearing to be able to defend themselves against false accusations
attributes.background:
Children's Services make accusations in Reports to Family Court
These reports contain false accusations and conjecture 
Which judges take as the truth judges should make children;s services
produce the evidence before tearing families apart 
This is nothing but INJUSTICE and against our rights

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be about the behaviour of judges and the courts. The courts system is entirely independent of the Government and Parliament. 

Perjury and perverting the course of justice are both against the law. If you have evidence that someone has committed one of these offences, that would be a matter for the police.
